html_body:
<script>
const placeholders = ["Spot Led 5w", "LÃ¢mpada Wifi", "Interruptor Inteligente"];
let currentPlaceholderIndex = 0;
const placeholderInput = document.getElementById("search-input");
let currentCharIndex = 0;
let typingInterval;

function changePlaceholder() {
    const placeholder = placeholders[currentPlaceholderIndex];
    
    if (currentCharIndex < placeholder.length) {
        placeholderInput.placeholder = placeholder.substring(0, currentCharIndex + 1);
        currentCharIndex++;
    } else {
        clearInterval(typingInterval);
        setTimeout(erasePlaceholder, 1000);
    }
}

function erasePlaceholder() {
    if (currentCharIndex > 0) {
        const placeholder = placeholders[currentPlaceholderIndex];
        placeholderInput.placeholder = placeholder.substring(0, currentCharIndex - 1);
        currentCharIndex--;
    } else {
        currentPlaceholderIndex = (currentPlaceholderIndex + 1) % placeholders.length;
        typingInterval = setInterval(changePlaceholder, 100);
    }
}

typingInterval = setInterval(changePlaceholder, 100);
</script>
